attributes.action: Halt the illegal deduction of NI charges from honest tax and NI paying citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When will this government ever stop expecting the honest, law abiding, employed citizens of this country to:
 1. Support the illegal users of the NHS
2. Line the pockets of suppliers and managers of the NHS with our contributions.
3. Ensure that the NI contributors are, as in the case of all government ministers, seen first.

I find it abhorrent that the government can steal mine and others hard earned money, to provide a NHS service for NON British people.
